Scheduling Specialist Examinations
VA examination providers schedule specialist examinations only when requested to do so.

M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, 2.A.6

title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Scheduling Examinations
